Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.timeseries

Distance functions designed for time series.

See: Description

    Class Description
    AbstractEditDistanceFunction
    Provides the Edit Distance for FeatureVectors.
    AbstractEditDistanceFunction.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    DerivativeDTWDistanceFunction
    Derivative Dynamic Time Warping distance for numerical vectors.

    Dynamic Time Warping distance (DTW) for numerical vectors.

    Parameterization class.
    EDRDistanceFunction

    LCSSDistanceFunction

    Parameterization class.

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.timeseries Description

Distance functions designed for time series.

Note that some regular distance functions (e.g. Euclidean) are also used on time series.
